thread.title: Next sees respite for UK consumer despite profit fall

title: Next sees respite for UK consumer despite profit fall
text:
Next sees respite for UK consumer despite profit fall Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:26 
British clothing chain Next forecasts a third straight decline in annual profit in its current year. But as David Pollard reports, its shares are the day's best performer on the UK's FTSE 100 index on an improved outlook for the UK consumer.   
British clothing chain Next forecasts a third straight decline in annual profit in its current year. But as David Pollard reports, its shares are the day's best performer on the UK's FTSE 100 index on an improved outlook for the UK consumer.  //reut.rs/2pAL2mZ
